data.name: BOQ Low Rate Visa Credit Card
data.description: Save more with a low interest rate on your purchases. Why pay high interest rates? With our Low Rate Credit Card, you can save straight away with our balance transfer offer. Low interest rate on purchases. Low annual card fee of $55.

cardArt.title: BOQ Low Rate Visa CC Card Art

features.additionalInfo: 0% p.a. on purchases and balance transfers for 12 months plus no balance transfer fee. No interest free days apply to retail purchases while you have a balance transfer. Reverts to cash advance rate. No interest free days apply while you have a balance transfer.
Low interest rate (13.49% p.a) on purchases.
Added security and authorisation for online purchases with Verified by Visa, FRAUDSHIELD and Visa Zero Liability.
Accepted at over 29 million locations and ATMs worldwide.
For purchases of up to $100, simply wave & go anywhere that has a Visa payWave sensor, making payments easy and convenient.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Earn a taxable income of $25,000 per year or more
Be a permanent Australian resident or citizen
Be at least 18 years of age

fees.name: International Cash Advance
fees.additionalInfo: International cash withdrawls made outside Australia on your credit card. Minimum fee amount of $4.00 and maximum amount of $30.00 debited to your Account on the Transaction Date.

fees.name: International Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For retail purchases or cash advance transactions made in a foreign currency or using a foreign merchant.

fees.name: Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee for each time a cheque or Direct Debit payment is dishonoured.

fees.name: Paper Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For each statement period we issue you with a paper statement, $2 will be debited to your account in the following statement period. This may be waived in limited circumstances.

fees.name: Domestic Cash Advance above $100
fees.additionalInfo: Domestic cash withdrawals from your credit card.. For any Cash Advance equal to or over $100 debited to your Account on the Transaction Date.

fees.name: Late Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee for each time we do not receive the Minimum Payment Due and any Overdue Amount by the payment due date, debited to your Account after the payment due date.

fees.name: Overlimit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee per statement period when your credit limit is exceeded.

fees.name: Domestic Cash Advance below $100
fees.additionalInfo: Domestic cash withdrawals from your credit card.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Except to the extent that an interest free period applies, you must pay interest on everything charged to your account. Interest is charged monthly at the end of each statement period. We calculate interest for each balance type at its applicable APR for each statement period. The APR (Annual Percentage Rate) that applies to each balance type (e.g. a balance transfer) also applies to related fees and interest. The Retail APR applies to retail purchase balance. To calculate that interest, we multiply the applicable daily percentage rate by the daily unpaid balance of its balance type (including related fees and interest) for each day of that statement period, and then add those amounts together. The daily percentage rate is the applicable APR divided by 365. Information on any APR is available on request.

We calculate interest for each balance type at its applicable APR for each statement period. The APR (Annual Percentage Rate) that applies to each balance type (e.g. a balance transfer) also applies to related fees and interest. The Retail APR applies to retail purchase balance. To calculate that interest, we multiply the applicable daily percentage rate by the daily unpaid balance of its balance type (including related fees and interest) for each day of that statement period, and then add those amounts together. The daily percentage rate is the applicable APR divided by 365. Information on any APR is available on request.
